meanings.definition: The state or quality of being pudgy.
meanings.sent1: Her pudginess made it difficult for her to fit into the small chair.
meanings.sent2: The baby's pudginess was adorable and made everyone want to pinch his cheeks.
meanings.sent3: Despite her pudginess, she was determined to win the dance competition.
meanings.sent4: The pudginess of the teddy bear made it the perfect cuddle buddy for the little girl.
meanings.sent5: The pudginess of the snowman's belly made him look even more jolly.

meanings.sent1: The puppy's pudginess was a result of too many treats from his owner.
meanings.sent2: She loved her grandmother's cooking, even though it contributed to her pudginess.
meanings.sent3: The pudginess of the squirrel made it comical as it tried to climb the tree.
meanings.sent4: The pudginess of the clouds in the sky signaled an impending storm.
meanings.sent5: The pudginess of the pillow made it extra comfortable for napping.
